doc.description: This module generates a forcefield based on range sensor measurements the use of single point range sensor

define.name: INNER_LIMIT
define.description: The inner border of the range forcefield, where the MAV will avoid the obstacle with the maximum velocity as given by MIN_VEL (in meters)

define.name: OUTER_LIMIT
define.description: The outer border of the range forcefield, where the MAV will start avoiding with velocity determined on the range measurement (starts with MIN_VEL)

define.name: MIN_VEL
define.description: The minimum velocity which forces the MAV out of the forcefield (in [m/s])

define.name: MAX_VEL
define.description: The maximum velocity which forces the MAV out of the forcefield (in [m/s])
